basic.description: This course consists of an examination of issues and concepts in art education, particularly from an "Art for Life" perspective, for pre-service art teachers. Course content includes exercises in aesthetic and critical inquiry related to art and visual culture as appropriate for K-12 educational theory and practice in art education.
basic.subject: ARE
basic.title: Art for Life

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admission to Art Education program. Corequisite: ARE 5046.
